subcategories.name: Endodontics
subcategories.description: The dental specialty focusing on the diagnosis and treatment of dental pulp and surrounding tissues, commonly involving root canal therapy to save or repair damaged teeth.

subcategories.name: Restorative Materials
subcategories.description: Dental materials used to restore the structure, function, and aesthetics of teeth, including fillings, crowns, and bridges.

subcategories.name: Consumables
subcategories.description: Supplies regularly used in dental procedures, such as gloves, masks, bibs, and other disposable items essential for maintaining a sterile environment.

subcategories.name: Prosthodontics
subcategories.description: The dental specialty involving the design, fabrication, and fitting of artificial replacements for missing teeth, including dentures, bridges, and dental implants.

subcategories.name: Orthodontics
subcategories.description: The specialty dealing with the diagnosis and correction of misalignments of teeth and jaws, often utilizing braces, aligners, and other orthodontic devices.

subcategories.name: Dental Equipment
subcategories.description: Various instruments and machinery used in dental practices, including chairs, drills, X-ray machines, and other tools essential for diagnostic and treatment procedures.

subcategories.name: Periodontics
subcategories.description: The dental specialty focused on the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of diseases affecting the gums and supporting structures of the teeth.

subcategories.name: Dental Instruments
subcategories.description: Tools used by dental professionals during examinations, surgeries, and procedures, ranging from diagnostic instruments to surgical implements.

subcategories.name: Trusted Names in Dental Care
subcategories.description: Reputable brands known for high-quality dental products. Brands include: 3M, Dentsply Sirona, Diadent, DenMax, and Mani, Inc.
